title: Using Fourier-neural recurrent networks to fit sequential input/output data

tldr.text: The use of Fourier-type activation functions in fully recurrent neural networks with main theoretical advantage is that, in principle, the problem of recovering internal coefficients from input/output data is solvable in closed form.
